57 // Class CollisionShape
62 class CollisionShape {
63 
64  protected :
65 
66  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
67 
69  CollisionShapeType mType;
70 
72  CollisionShapeName mName;
73 
75  uint mId;
76 
77 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
78 
80  Profiler* mProfiler;
81 
82 #endif
83 
84  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
85 
87  virtual bool testPointInside(const Vector3& worldPoint, ProxyShape* proxyShape) const=0;
88 
90  virtual bool raycast(const Ray& ray, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, ProxyShape* proxyShape, MemoryAllocator& allocator) const=0;
91 
93  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const = 0;
94 
95  public :
96 
97  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
98 
100  CollisionShape(CollisionShapeName name, CollisionShapeType type);
101 
103  virtual ~CollisionShape() = default;
104 
106  CollisionShape(const CollisionShape& shape) = delete;
107 
109  CollisionShape& operator=(const CollisionShape& shape) = delete;
110 
112  CollisionShapeName getName() const;
113 
115  CollisionShapeType getType() const;
116 
118  virtual bool isConvex() const=0;
119 
121  virtual bool isPolyhedron() const=0;
122 
124  virtual void getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const=0;
125 
127  Vector3 getLocalScaling() const;
128 
130  uint getId() const;
131 
133  virtual void computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3& tensor, decimal mass) const=0;
134 
136  virtual void computeAABB(AABB& aabb, const Transform& transform) const;
137 
139  virtual std::string to_string() const=0;
140 
141 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
142 
144  virtual void setProfiler(Profiler* profiler);
145 
146 #endif
147 
148  // -------------------- Friendship -------------------- //
149 
150  friend class ProxyShape;
151  friend class CollisionWorld;
152 };

154 // Return the name of the collision shape
158 inline CollisionShapeName CollisionShape::getName() const {
159  return mName;
160 }
